titleInfo.title: Ecological Fiscal Reform and Sustainable Urban Growth - A Research Framework

originInfo.publisher: National Round Table on the Environment and the Economy

mods.abstract: This report delivered to the NRTEE provides background information, data, and comparisons of sustainable urban growth as it pertains to Canadian cities. It addresses the federal responses to sustainability, and fiscal responsiblities urban sustainablility. Finally, this report looks at possible actors, research paramaters, and what can be done in Canada.
